channel.title: Homes on Josiah Parry

item.title: Introducing geniusR
item.description: Introducing geniusR. A new R package for acquiring song lyrics as text data in a format "hardwired for tidytext". ðŸ¤˜ Get Started!

About Me My name is Josiah Parry. I am a person of eclectic interests; some of which are social science, politics, espresso, data science, and music. I devote much of my time to utilising data to understand social systems. During the 2018 midterm elections I served as the New Hampshire Data Director for NextGen Rising. I am currently a Masters student at Northeastern University studying Urban Informatics in the School of Public Policy and Urban Affairs.

Experience NH Data Director NextGen America April - November 2018 Database Administrator Accenture June - August 2017 Maintained Oracle 11g & 12c databases Automated daily reporting utilizing Linux & PL/SQL scripts Analyzed & Optimized production queries Managed DB versioning with Git, Gerrit, and Jenkins Handled handover calls with offshore team GIS Teaching Assistant Plymouth State University September 2016 - December 2017 Selected to assist in instruction of Introduction to GIS by faculty Hosted out of class tutoring in GIS Instructed data management, spatial analysis, and cartography Spatial Data Analyst Lakes Region Planning Commission December 2016 - May 2017 Integrated 10 years of data into single organized structure Created custom R package to read and manage traffic count data Utilized R & QGIS to perform spatio-temporal analysis of NH Lakes Region Traffic Patterns Compared state to regional traffic & presented results Curriculum Development Intern (R-Finance) DataCamp

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X: CS101: An intro to computer science CS102: An intro to computer science CS103: An intro to computer science CS104: An intro to computer science CS105: An intro to computer science CS106: An intro to computer science CS107: An intro to computer science
